content:
---
title: "Introduction to Data Science"
date: 2024-01-05
tags: data-science, python, pandas, numpy

Data science is the art of extracting insights from data using statistical methods and programming.
Python is one of the most popular languages for data science due to its rich ecosystem.

We'll explore pandas for data manipulation and numpy for numerical computing.
